Statistical Generation of a Technical Vocabulary .A Stone, D. C. The results of an experiment in the use of statistical techniques for extracting a technical vocabulary from document texts are presented and discussed.. .X 29	1	69 51	2	69 68	1	69 69	5	69 71	1	69 77	1	69 79	2	69 168	2	69 175	2	69 176	1	69 261	1	69 315	1	69 324	1	69 346	1	69 382	2	69 441	1	69 448	1	69 458	1	69 476	1	69 477	1	69 478	1	69 479	2	69 480	2	69 483	1	69 484	2	69 485	1	69 486	1	69 488	1	69 491	1	69 493	1	69 503	1	69 507	1	69 509	1	69 510	1	69 512	1	69 517	1	69 520	1	69 522	1	69 527	1	69 528	1	69 531	1	69 558	1	69 565	1	69 566	3	69 577	1	69 581	1	69 596	1	69 603	1	69 608	1	69 633	1	69 659	1	69 660	1	69 662	1	69 680	1	69 704	1	69 715	1	69 754	1	69 780	1	69 781	1	69 790	1	69 805	1	69 809	1	69 810	1	69 812	1	69 813	1	69 814	1	69 817	1	69 824	1	69 825	1	69 894	1	69 1051	1	69 1118	1	69 1175	1	69 1282	1	69 1294	2	69 1327	1	69 1419	1	69 1427	1	69 1427	1	69
